001package org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils;
002
003import java.util.Arrays;
004import java.util.Map;
005import java.util.Objects;
006import java.util.function.Function;
007import java.util.stream.Collectors;
008
009/**
010 * Utility-class to work with properties of any Java-object (some extension to JDK's reflection)
011 */
012public class CorePropsUtils {
013
014    /**
015     * Comparing on equality of the same property of two objects of the same type.
016     *
017     * @param objOne the first object
018     * @param objTwo the second object
019     * @param getterFunc the reference to getter-method
020     * @return {@code true} if the properties are equal or both are eventually {@code null} (and otherwise - {@code false})
021     * @param <T> the type of both objects
022     * @param <V> the type of properties (that is inferred once the method reference is provided)
023     */
024    public static <T, V> boolean equalProps(T objOne, T objTwo, Function<T, V> getterFunc) {
025        V propOne = objOne == null ? null : getterFunc.apply(objOne);
026        V propTwo = objTwo == null ? null : getterFunc.apply(objTwo);
027        return Objects.equals(propOne, propTwo);
028    }
029
030    /**
031     * The same as {@link #propValue(Object, String...)}, but cast the final value to string,
032     * or transform that value using standard {@link String#valueOf(Object)}
033     * (which is the same as invoking {@link Object#toString()} on that object)
034     *
035     * @param parent the root value to start the property-chain
036     * @param propNameChain the chain of nested property-names
037     * @return the value of the last property in that property-chain as {@link String}
038     */
039    public static String propValueStr(Object parent, String... propNameChain) {
040        Object propValueObj = propValue(parent, propNameChain);
041        return propValueObj == null ? null : String.valueOf(propValueObj);
042    }
043
044    /**
045     * Getting the value of nested properties of <b>{@code th-tool}</b>-variable by providing the chain of property-names,
046     * which is quite the same as Thymeleaf-Engine does when processing the expression
047     * of form {@code ${varName.propName.nestedPropName...}}. At the moment only nested objects
048     * of type {@link Map Map&lt;String,Object&gt;} are supported.
049     *
050     * @param parent the root value to start the property-chain
051     * @param propNameChain the chain of nested property-names
052     * @return the value of the last property in that property-chain
053     */
054    @SuppressWarnings("rawtypes")
055    public static Object propValue(Object parent, String... propNameChain) {
056        Object value = parent;
057        for (int propNameIndex = 0; propNameIndex < propNameChain.length; propNameIndex++) {
058            String propName = propNameChain[propNameIndex];
059            if (value instanceof Map parentMap) {
060                value = parentMap.get(propName);
061            } else {
062                // all values except the last one are expected to be maps
063                throw new IllegalArgumentException(String.format(
064                    "Could not resolve the property-chain '%s' - the tail '%s' is unresolved " +
065                        "(the value of '%s' is expected to be a Map, but %s).",
066                    propChainStr(propNameChain),
067                    propChainTailStr(propNameIndex, propNameChain),
068                    propChainHeadStr(propNameIndex, propNameChain),
069                    wrongValueDescription(value)
070                ));
071            }
072        }
073        return value;
074    }
075
076    private static String wrongValueDescription(Object value) {
077        return value == null ? "it's null" : String.format("it's of type <<%s>>", value.getClass());
078    }
079
080    private static String propChainStr(String... propChain) {
081        return propChainStr(0, propChain.length, propChain);
082    }
083
084    private static String propChainHeadStr(int propIndex, String... propChain) {
085        return propChainStr(0, propIndex, propChain);
086    }
087
088    private static String propChainTailStr(int propIndex, String... propChain) {
089        return propChainStr(propIndex, propChain.length, propChain);
090    }
091
092    private static String propChainStr(int indexFrom, int indexTo, String... propChain) {
093        return Arrays.stream(propChain, indexFrom, indexTo).collect(Collectors.joining("."));
094    }
095
096    // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
097
098    private CorePropsUtils() {
099        // prohibit the creation of utility-class instance
100        throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Cannot instantiate utility-class " + getClass().getName());
101    }
102}
